
image1:
- 960x1007
- (390, 785, 570, 798)
image2:
- 1431x708
- (626, 490, 803, 503)

y1 = m*x2 + b
y2 = m*x2 + b

x Position oben links:
390 = m*960 + b
626 = m*1431 + b
390 - 960m = 636 - 1431m
-256 = -471m
m = 256/471 = 0.5435244161358811
b = -131.78343949044586

y Position oben links:
785 = m*1007 + b
490 = m*708 + b
785 - 1007m = 490 - 708m
295 = 299m
m = 295/299 = 0.9866220735785953
b = -208.52842809364552

x Position unten rechts:
570 = m*960 + b
803 = m*1431 + b
570 - 960m = 803 - 1431m
-233 = -471m
m = 233/471 = 0.49469214437367304
b = 95.09554140127386

y Position unten rechts:
798 = m*1007 + b
503 = m*708 + b
798 - 1007m = 503 - 708m
211 = 362m
m = 211/362 = 0.5828729281767956
b = 211.0469613259669
